includedAssets.title: Day 2: 8:00 A.M. - 9:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Day two of the hit real-time drama. When terrorists threaten to detonate a nuclear bomb in LA, President Palmer calls Jack Bauer back from inactive status.
